name: Lucid Dreams (KhaDev)
description:
Welcome to my First Game's page!

This is my entry to the Mini Game Jam 122 with the limitation  nice idea of: Losing is good.

I hope you will like the idea which is about a teenager (no offense to any of them) who abused of lucid dreaming (which is when you know that you are in a dream so you do what the hell you want) and has to wake up but needs to kill him-self in each dream in order to achieve this.
